title: Untitled
text:
Five officers plan to sue North Bergen Police Chief Robert Farley for harassment, retaliation, and sexual misconduct. Allegations include defecating by desks, drugging coffee with Viagra and Adderall, and jabbing a needle into an officerâ€™s genitals.

The officers describe a hostile workplace filled with juvenile and abusive behavior since Farley became chief in February. A state investigation is underway after he was reported to the attorney general.
